rows.label: tlk42350143_02_msg0001
rows.name:
We at Kurolo are discussing
how to increase the shop's
product lineup, mo.

rows.label: tlk42350143_02_msg0002
rows.name:
We were asked by the six great
noble families of Invidia, so
we're thinking tirelessly, mo.

rows.label: tlk42350143_02_msg0003
rows.name:
To be honest, there's a limit to the
new products we can create using
only our country's materials, mo.

rows.label: tlk42350143_01_msg0004
rows.name:
To add new things, we need
new ideas and materials, mo.

rows.label: tlk42350143_02_msg0004
rows.name:
The quickest way to do that is
to rely on other countries, mo.

rows.label: tlk42350143_02_msg0005
rows.name:
As a country develops, economic activity
becomes more vigorous, and other countries
become more willing to negotiate with us, mo.

rows.label: tlk42350143_02_msg0006
rows.name:
Then, the ideas and materials that
come in from other countries will
give birth to new products, mo.

rows.label: tlk42350143_02_msg0007
rows.name:
But problems will always
arise from that, so they
must be resolved, mo.

rows.label: tlk42350143_02_msg0008
rows.name:
That's where a mercenary group
that can solve cross-border
problems comes in, mo!

rows.label: tlk42350143_02_msg0009
rows.name:
In other words, a request
will come, so you all will
need to work hard, mo.
